data.message: Now, y'all hate Eminem because he went against the grain. Eminem doesn't give a shit if y'all stand with him or not. He got his message across. That's all that matters. Lol, crybaby's

Andrew Lo right lol hats why I said he’s riding he grain because he is going right with the damn grain but I guess people didn’t get it and thought i was giving em props 😂😂😂😂😂 this is so whak and Ive been a fan since he came out in the 90s

His message was telling anyone who supports the POTUS to fuck off! This is what is dividing us, when will you people open your eyes. All this hate and nasty rhetoric is appalling. It is like liberals are children and whining and threatening is all they have so they throw a tantrum and cannot have a friend who supports the president. This is insane and anyone who supports what garbage this kid is spewing is dividing this country. You do not see Republicans running around bashing people in the head or shooting people or blasting hate on the internet. Antifa and these other liberal groups are destroying our country.  😔

I didnt hate on kanye after he went and did that dumb shit I aint gonna hate on eminem either, he is a somewhat talented hip hop artist and I'll listen to his music if I feel like it, as an artist I respect eminem as a person Idk him or give a fuck what he thinks either way.

NEWSFLASH!!! Just like the NFL going down the crapper,so will he now! I have already been pulling all his crap out and i plan to take a sledgehammer to the CD's and burning all the rest! Lets see how he likes it when HALF of his fans bail out on his upcoming concerts and the remaining sales of his merchandise! Pretty immature and brave move when you come from the projects and barely had food on the table daily,yeah that GRATITUDE im talkiin about,trust me,I KNOW the D where he comes from,hes FORGETTING all the things NA has taught his arse! Looks like his 12 steps has just flung out the window and if he wants to go back to the projects brown nosing the thugs,i dont care,let him! He deserves it after this!!!! That douche is in relapse mode man! Thats not the behavior of a "recovering addict" at all! And after ALL his fans did,standing by his side in the midst of all his fricking ups & down with dope and etc.,this is what he does now at 44 yrs old? Seriously? Hes lost his mind! Im 43 and THAT is NOT the behavior of a 43 yr old,let alone one recovering! He wants to be a old geriatric thug,thats on him but eventually everyone around him will find it annoying. Call your sponsor Marshall lol,well depending who your sponsor is!!! Time to get humble buddy! Get out the big book and go over them steps!!!
Eminem is the one still crying. Good grief it's been almost a year. Get over the election already
Eminem need the Waaaaaaaaaaambulance!!!
